channel.title: Leehow的小站
channel.description: Leehow的博客，记录个人学习过程。好耶！

item.title: 使用 vercel 加速 Github 图床
利用 Cloudflare Pages 和 BPB 面板搭建免费VPN订阅节点
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290144107.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>无需域名，无需 SSL，通过 Cloudflare 和 BPB Panel，搭建一个永久免费且高速的免费 VPN。结合 Cloudflare 实现优选订阅、永久免费 vless 节点订阅，为使用（singbox-core 和 xray-core）的跨平台客户端提供配置。</p>
<h2 id="github" class="heading-element"><span>1 GitHub</span>
 <a href="#github" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>登录 GitHub，fork <a href="https://github.com/bia-pain-bache/BPB-Worker-Panel"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">BPB 面板<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>到自己仓库中。可以更改仓库名。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>fork仓库</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png" alt="fork仓库" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408210057058.png?size=large 2x" data-title="fork仓库" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">fork仓库</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="cloudflare" class="heading-element"><span>2 Cloudflare</span>
 <a href="#cloudflare" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>登录 <a href="https://dash.Cloudflare.com/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Cloudflare<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
<h3 id="创建-kv" class="heading-element"><span>2.1 创建 KV</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-kv" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>点击左侧栏 <strong>Workers 和 Pages</strong> -&gt; 【KV】，点击<strong>创建命名空间</strong>。
随便起个名字，点击添加。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>创建 KV</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png" alt="创建 KV" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282353466.png?size=large 2x" data-title="创建 KV" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">创建 KV</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<div class="alert alert-note"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1116 0A8 8 0 010 8zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5.0 100 13 6.5 6.5.0 000-13zM6.5 7.75A.75.75.0 017.25 7h1a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2a.75.75.0 010-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75.0 01-.75-.75zM8 6a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>注意</p><p>如果创建失败，或者遇到进不去页面等问题，可以尝试先进行下一步<a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-pages">创建 Pages</a>再回来创建 KV。</p>
</div><h3 id="创建-pages" class="heading-element"><span>2.2 创建 Pages</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-pages" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ol>
<li>
<p>点击左侧栏 <strong>Workers 和 Pages</strong> -&gt; 【概述】，点击<strong>创建</strong>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>创建 Pages</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png" alt="创建 Pages" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282337942.png?size=large 2x" data-title="创建 Pages" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">创建 Pages</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>选择 【Pages】 -&gt; 【连接到 Git】

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>连接到 Git</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png" alt="连接到 Git" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408282356132.png?size=large 2x" data-title="连接到 Git" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">连接到 Git</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>安装 Cloudflare 插件
登录 fork 了 BPB 面板仓库的 GitHub 账号。
安装 Cloudflare 插件，可以选择为全部仓库安装，也可以选择指定 BPB 面板仓库。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>安装 Cloudflare 插件</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png" alt="安装 Cloudflare 插件" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290003015.png?size=large 2x" data-title="安装 Cloudflare 插件" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">安装 Cloudflare 插件</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>创建 Pages 项目
插件安装完成后，自动跳转回 Pages 创建页面。选择 BPB 面板仓库，点击开始设置。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>开始设置</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png" alt="开始设置" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290005720.png?size=large 2x" data-title="开始设置" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">开始设置</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
</ol>
<p>项目名称随便写。点击环境变量，分别设置 <strong>UUID</strong> 和 <strong>PROXYIP</strong>。点击部署。</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>UUID</strong>：直接安装的 BPB 面板默认使用同一个 UUID [89b3cbba-e6ac-485a-9481-976a0415eab9]，可能存在安全隐患。可以去 <a href="https://1024tools.com/uuid"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">在线生成 UUID 1<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> | <a href="https://www.lddgo.net/string/uuid"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">在线生成 UUID 2<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 等网站随机生成一个新的 UUID</li>
<li><strong>PROXYIP</strong>：去这里<a href="https://www.nslookup.io/domains/cdn.xn--b6gac.eu.org/dns-records/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">随机选择一个代理 IP<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>，或者你也可以直接把代理 IP 设置为 <code>cdn-b100.xn--b6gac.eu.org</code></li>
</ul>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>设置环境变量并部署</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png" alt="设置环境变量并部署" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290013515.png?size=large 2x" data-title="设置环境变量并部署" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">设置环境变量并部署</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>稍等片刻，部署成功！

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>部署成功</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png" alt="部署成功" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290035625.png?size=large 2x" data-title="部署成功" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">部署成功</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="绑定-kv" class="heading-element"><span>2.3 绑定 KV</span>
 <a href="#%e7%bb%91%e5%ae%9a-kv" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>部署完成后，点击继续处理项目。或者返回到概述中，选择部署的项目，点击访问站点，访问项目页面。
点击<strong>设置</strong> -&gt; <strong>函数</strong>，在函数页面中，找到 KV 命名空间绑定，点击<strong>添加绑定</strong>。</p>
<ul>
<li>变量名称：能且仅能填写 <strong>bpb</strong></li>
<li>KV 命名空间：选择<a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-kv">创建 KV</a> 中设置的命名空间

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>绑定kv</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png" alt="绑定kv" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290039054.png?size=large 2x" data-title="绑定kv" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">绑定kv</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="重新部署" class="heading-element"><span>2.4 重新部署</span>
 <a href="#%e9%87%8d%e6%96%b0%e9%83%a8%e7%bd%b2" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>KV 空间绑定后，在所有部署中 点击三个点——重试部署。</p>
<div class="alert alert-note"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1116 0A8 8 0 010 8zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5.0 100 13 6.5 6.5.0 000-13zM6.5 7.75A.75.75.0 017.25 7h1a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2a.75.75.0 010-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75.0 01-.75-.75zM8 6a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>注意</p><p>注意：在项目有任何改动后，都需要进行重新部署，否则改动不会生效。</p>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>重新部署</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png" alt="重新部署" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290046972.png?size=large 2x" data-title="重新部署" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">重新部署</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="bpb-面板" class="heading-element"><span>3 BPB 面板</span>
 <a href="#bpb-%e9%9d%a2%e6%9d%bf" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>访问项目网址： <em>https://你的项目地址.pages.dev/panel</em></p>
<h3 id="修改密码" class="heading-element"><span>3.1 修改密码</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%af%86%e7%a0%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>第一次访问面板会提示你修改密码，建议修改成一个复杂密码，避免面板被盗用。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>修改密码</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png" alt="修改密码" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290050299.png?size=large 2x" data-title="修改密码" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">修改密码</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="面板配置" class="heading-element"><span>3.2 面板配置</span>
 <a href="#%e9%9d%a2%e6%9d%bf%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>使用修改后的密码重新登录面板。</p>
<ol>
<li>勾选屏蔽广告、绕过伊朗和绕过局域网。Block Porn 是屏蔽一些少儿不宜的网站，可以不勾选。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>绕过</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png" alt="绕过" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290053192.png?size=large 2x" data-title="绕过" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">绕过</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
<li>点击 <a href="https://scanner.github1.cloud/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Scan Now<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 扫描 Clean IP。一般来说，Clean IP 的节点RTT 会更短。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Scan Now</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png" alt="Scan Now" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290057503.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Scan Now" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Scan Now</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<div class="alert alert-note"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 8a8 8 0 1116 0A8 8 0 010 8zm8-6.5a6.5 6.5.0 100 13 6.5 6.5.0 000-13zM6.5 7.75A.75.75.0 017.25 7h1a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.75h.25a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2a.75.75.0 010-1.5h.25v-2h-.25a.75.75.0 01-.75-.75zM8 6a1 1 0 110-2 1 1 0 010 2z"/></svg>注意</p><p>为了扫描出与你实际网络通信时间最短的IP，扫描时记得关闭代理。</p>
</div><p>点击Start Scan，开始扫描。第一次扫描的IP数较少，你可以点击下方提示，扫描更多IP。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>扫描Clean IP</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png" alt="扫描Clean IP" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290102440.png?size=large 2x" data-title="扫描Clean IP" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">扫描Clean IP</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>将扫描到的Clean IP填到BPB面板配置中。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>配置Clean IP</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png" alt="配置Clean IP" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290105211.png?size=large 2x" data-title="配置Clean IP" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">配置Clean IP</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<ol start="3">
<li>TLS 端口处勾选你想启用的端口，或者默认使用443端口。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>启用TLS端口</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png" alt="启用TLS端口" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290056538.png?size=large 2x" data-title="启用TLS端口" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">启用TLS端口</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<p>点击 <strong>APPLY SETTINGS</strong>，应用设置。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>APPLY SETTINGS</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png" alt="APPLY SETTINGS" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290106273.png?size=large 2x" data-title="APPLY SETTINGS" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">APPLY SETTINGS</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="导入节点" class="heading-element"><span>3.3 导入节点</span>
 <a href="#%e5%af%bc%e5%85%a5%e8%8a%82%e7%82%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>点击 COPY SUB，复制 BPB 面板生成的订阅链接。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>复制订阅链接</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png" alt="复制订阅链接" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290110707.png?size=large 2x" data-title="复制订阅链接" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">复制订阅链接</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h4 id="pc-v2rayn" class="heading-element"><span>3.3.1 PC-V2rayN</span>
 <a href="#pc-v2rayn" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><h5 id="导入" class="heading-element"><span>3.3.1.1 导入</span>
 <a href="#%e5%af%bc%e5%85%a5" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h5><p>打开 V2rayN，【订阅分组】-&gt;【订阅分组设置】-&gt;【添加】</p>
<ul>
<li>别名：随机写一个</li>
<li>可选地址：输入 BPB 面板导出的订阅链接

 </figure></li>
</ul>

 </a>
</h5><p>【订阅分组】-&gt;【更新全部订阅(不通过代理)】，获取节点

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>获取节点</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png" alt="获取节点" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290117981.png?size=large 2x" data-title="获取节点" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">获取节点</figcaption>

 </a>
</h5><p>首页右上角三个点 -&gt; 更新订阅

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>更新订阅</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png" alt="更新订阅" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290131358.png?size=large 2x" data-title="更新订阅" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">更新订阅</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="修改密码-1" class="heading-element"><span>3.4 修改密码</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9%e5%af%86%e7%a0%81-1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>如果你觉得原来设置的密码太简单，也可以重新修改密码。
登录你的 BPB 面板，到页面最底端，点击 <strong>Change Password</strong> 来修改密码

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>修改密码</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png" alt="修改密码" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202408290120104.png?size=large 2x" data-title="修改密码" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">修改密码</figcaption>
 </figure></p>

item.title: 通过Cloudflare tunnel访问内网端口
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141503511.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>通过Cloudflare Tunnel内网穿透，访问内网主机端口。</p>
<h2 id="tunnel-可以做什么" class="heading-element"><span>1 Tunnel 可以做什么</span>
 <a href="#tunnel-%e5%8f%af%e4%bb%a5%e5%81%9a%e4%bb%80%e4%b9%88" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li><strong>将本地网络的服务暴露到公网，可以理解为内网穿透。</strong> 例如我们在本地服务器 <code>192.168.1.1:3000</code> 搭建了一个 Transmission 服务用于 BT 下载，我们只能在内网环境才能访问这个服务，但通过内网穿透技术，我们可以在任何广域网环境下访问该服务。相比 NPS 之类传统穿透服务，Tunnel 不需要公网云服务器，同时自带域名解析，无需 DDNS 和公网 IP。</li>
<li><strong>将非常规端口服务转发到 80/443 常规端口。</strong> 无论是使用公网 IP + DDNS 还是传统内网穿透服务，都免不了使用非常规端口进行访问，如果某些服务使用了复杂的重定向可能会导致 URL 中端口号丢失而引起不可控的问题，同时也不够优雅。</li>
<li><strong>自动为你的域名提供 HTTPS 认证。</strong></li>
<li><strong>为你的服务提供额外保护认证。</strong></li>
<li><strong>最重要的是——免费。</strong></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="tunnel-工作原理" class="heading-element"><span>2 Tunnel 工作原理</span>
 <a href="#tunnel-%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c%e5%8e%9f%e7%90%86" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Tunnel 通过在本地网络运行的一个 Cloudflare 守护程序，与 Cloudflare 云端通信，将云端请求数据转发到本地网络的 IP + 端口。</p>
<h2 id="前置条件" class="heading-element"><span>3 前置条件</span>
 <a href="#%e5%89%8d%e7%bd%ae%e6%9d%a1%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>持有一个域名</li>
<li>将域名 DNS 解析托管到 CF</li>
<li>内网有一台本地服务器，用于运行本地与 cloudflare 通信的 cloudflared 程序</li>
<li>一张境内双币信用卡（仅用于添加付款方式，服务是免费的）</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="开始" class="heading-element"><span>4 开始</span>
 <a href="#%e5%bc%80%e5%a7%8b" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="创建-cloudflare-zero-trust" class="heading-element"><span>4.1 创建 <strong>Cloudflare Zero Trust</strong></span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-cloudflare-zero-trust" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ol>
<li>打开 <a href="https://one.dash.cloudflare.com/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Cloudflare Zero Trust<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 工作台面板。</li>
<li>创建 <strong>Cloudflare Zero Trust</strong> ，选择免费计划。需要提供付款方式，使用境内的双币卡即可。</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>随意填写一个team name</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png" alt="随意填写一个team name" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355958.png?size=large 2x" data-title="随意填写一个team name" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">随意填写一个team name</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>

 </figure></p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>添加付款方式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png" alt="添加付款方式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355960.png?size=large 2x" data-title="添加付款方式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">添加付款方式</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>填写信用卡信息（仅验证，不会扣款），完成配置</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png" alt="填写信用卡信息（仅验证，不会扣款），完成配置" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122355961.png?size=large 2x" data-title="填写信用卡信息（仅验证，不会扣款），完成配置" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">填写信用卡信息（仅验证，不会扣款），完成配置</figcaption>

<h3 id="创建-tunnel" class="heading-element"><span>4.2 创建 Tunnel</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%9b%e5%bb%ba-tunnel" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>点击 Access——Tunnels，创建一个 Tunnel。</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>创建一个 Tunnel</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png" alt="创建一个 Tunnel" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401122351924.png?size=large 2x" data-title="创建一个 Tunnel" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">创建一个 Tunnel</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>为创建的 tunnel 取一个名字。</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>为tunnel取一个名字</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png" alt="为tunnel取一个名字" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130000169.png?size=large 2x" data-title="为tunnel取一个名字" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">为tunnel取一个名字</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="部署-tunnel" class="heading-element"><span>4.3 部署 Tunnel</span>
 <a href="#%e9%83%a8%e7%bd%b2-tunnel" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Tunnel 部署方式，这里推荐选择 docker。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>获取 Cloudflared docker部署命令及 Token</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png" alt="获取 Cloudflared docker部署命令及 Token" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130002128.png?size=large 2x" data-title="获取 Cloudflared docker部署命令及 Token" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">获取 Cloudflared docker部署命令及 Token</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>将图中的 token 替换到下面的命令中，然后执行，启动 docker。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">docker run --name cf-tunnel -d --restart always cloudflare/cloudflared:latest tunnel --no-autoupdate run --token &lt;YourToken&gt;</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="配置域名和转发-url" class="heading-element"><span>4.4 配置域名和转发 URL</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e5%9f%9f%e5%90%8d%e5%92%8c%e8%bd%ac%e5%8f%91-url" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ul>
<li>子域名（Subdomain）：自定义一个。Path 留空。</li>
<li>Type：<code>SSH</code>。URL ：<code>localhost:22</code>。</li>
</ul>
<div class="alert alert-tip"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M8 1.5c-2.363.0-4 1.69-4 3.75.0.984.424 1.625.984 2.304l.214.253c.223.264.47.556.673.848.284.411.537.896.621 1.49a.75.75.0 01-1.484.211c-.04-.282-.163-.547-.37-.847a8.456 8.456.0 00-.542-.68c-.084-.1-.173-.205-.268-.32C3.201 7.75 2.5 6.766 2.5 5.25 2.5 2.31 4.863.0 8 0s5.5 2.31 5.5 5.25c0 1.516-.701 2.5-1.328 3.259-.095.115-.184.22-.268.319-.207.245-.383.453-.541.681-.208.3-.33.565-.37.847a.751.751.0 01-1.485-.212c.084-.593.337-1.078.621-1.489.203-.292.45-.584.673-.848.075-.088.147-.173.213-.253.561-.679.985-1.32.985-2.304.0-2.06-1.637-3.75-4-3.75zM5.75 12h4.5a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-4.5a.75.75.0 010-1.5zM6 15.25a.75.75.0 01.75-.75h2.5a.75.75.0 010 1.5h-2.5A.75.75.0 016 15.25z"/></svg>提示</p><p>如果需要转发其他协议和端口，你可以选择相应的 Type 和 URL。</p>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>配置域名</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png" alt="配置域名" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401130019856.png?size=large 2x" data-title="配置域名" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">配置域名</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="完成" class="heading-element"><span>5 完成</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%8c%e6%88%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>接着访问刚刚配置的三级域名，例如<code>https://app.yourdomain.com</code>（是的，你没看错，是 https，cloudflare 已经自动为域名提供了 https 证书）就可以访问到内网的非公端口号服务了。一个 Tunnel 中可以添加多条三级域名来跳转到不同的内网服务，在 Tunnel 页面的 Public Hostname 中新增即可。</p>
<h2 id="为你的服务添加额外验证" class="heading-element"><span>6 为你的服务添加额外验证</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%ba%e4%bd%a0%e7%9a%84%e6%9c%8d%e5%8a%a1%e6%b7%bb%e5%8a%a0%e9%a2%9d%e5%a4%96%e9%aa%8c%e8%af%81" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>如果你觉得这种直接暴露内网服务的方式有较高的安全风险，我们还可以使用 Application 功能为服务添加额外的安全验证。</p>
<ol>
<li>点击 Application - Get started。</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Application</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png" alt="Application" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141511385.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Application" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Application</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>创建 Application</p>
<ol start="2">
<li>选择 Self-hosted。</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>选择 Self-hosted</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png" alt="选择 Self-hosted" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141512523.png?size=large 2x" data-title="选择 Self-hosted" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">选择 Self-hosted</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>选择类型</p>
<ol start="3">
<li>填写配置，<strong>注意 Subdomain 和 Domain 需要使用刚刚创建的 Tunnel 服务相同的 Domain 配置</strong>。</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>配置三级域名</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png" alt="配置三级域名" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513455.png?size=large 2x" data-title="配置三级域名" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">配置三级域名</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>配置三级域名</p>
<ol start="4">
<li>选择验证方式。填写 Policy name（任意）。在 Include 区域选择验证方式，示例图片中使用的是 Email 域名的方式，用户在访问该网络时需要使用指定的邮箱域名（如@gmail.com）验证，这种方式比较适合自定义域名的企业邮箱用户。另外你还可以指定特定完整邮箱地址、IP 地址范围等方式。</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>选择验证方式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png" alt="选择验证方式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141513592.png?size=large 2x" data-title="选择验证方式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">选择验证方式</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>选择验证方式</p>
<ol start="5">
<li>完成添加</li>
</ol>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>完成添加</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png" alt="完成添加" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514826.png?size=large 2x" data-title="完成添加" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">完成添加</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>此时，访问 <a href="https://app.yourdomain.com"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">https://app.yourdomain.com<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 可以看到网站多了一个验证页面，使用刚刚设置的域名邮箱，接收验证码来访问。</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>验证页面</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png" alt="验证页面" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141514928.png?size=large 2x" data-title="验证页面" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">验证页面</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="评价" class="heading-element"><span>7 评价</span>
 <a href="#%e8%af%84%e4%bb%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>除了上述直接转发 http 服务之外，Tunnel 还支持 RDP、SSH 等协议的转发，玩法丰富，有待各位探索。作为一款免费的服务，简单的配置，低门槛使用条件，适合各位 Self-hosted 玩家尝试。不过要注意的是 Tunnel 在国内访问速度不快，并且有断流的情况，请酌情使用。</p>
<h2 id="参考文章" class="heading-element"><span>8 参考文章</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e6%96%87%e7%ab%a0" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>

item.title: 重装Windows系统记录
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202405141456243.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>本文主要是记录给小白（女朋友）重装系统的流程，包括重装系统使用的工具和进入新系统后的软件配置。</p>
<h2 id="一重装系统" class="heading-element"><span>一、重装系统</span>
 <a href="#%e4%b8%80%e9%87%8d%e8%a3%85%e7%b3%bb%e7%bb%9f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h2 id="11-启动盘工具" class="heading-element"><span>1 1.1 启动盘工具</span>
 <a href="#11-%e5%90%af%e5%8a%a8%e7%9b%98%e5%b7%a5%e5%85%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><a href="https://www.ventoy.net/cn/index.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">ventoy<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>可以满足一个U盘安装多个系统，<a href="https://www.ventoy.net/cn/download.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">下载地址<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>ventoy</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png" alt="ventoy" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301281546842.png?size=large 2x" data-title="ventoy" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">ventoy</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>插入U盘，打开<code>Ventoy2Disk.exe</code>，配置选项——分区类型，勾选<code>GPT</code>。
点击安装，<strong>注意此步骤会清空U盘全部数据</strong>。如果U盘已经安装过ventoy，则点击升级，升级操作不会清空U盘数据。</p>

</h2><h3 id="windows" class="heading-element"><span>2.1 Windows</span>
 <a href="#windows" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>建议直接<a href="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/370231492"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">参考教程<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>从微软官网下载，<a href="https://www.microsoft.com/software-download/windows11"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Windows11<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>同理。原理是更改浏览器为非Windows UA以获取下载直链。注意，下载<code>Windows 10/11 64bit</code>版本，不要下载家庭中文版。</p>
<p><strong>注意事项</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>建议选择<strong>专业工作站</strong>版本</li>
<li>条件允许的情况下，可以将Windows安装到200GB以上的分区（需提前清空该分区所有数据）。毕竟小白不懂，只会狂点下一步把软件都安装到C盘。</li>
<li>Windows无法安装到这个磁盘，选中的磁盘采用GPT分区形式</li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>弹出这个提示，主要是电脑硬盘格式为GPT分区表，而U盘启动引导方式为“Legacy”模式，导致了开机引导方式和磁盘数据结构不匹配导致的问题！正确的开机引导方式和磁盘数据结构：Legacy引导对应的是MBR分区；UEFI引导对应的是GPT分区。
<strong>推荐的解决方法：将U盘启动UEFI模式</strong>
将电脑重启，重新选择U盘启动模式，在BIOS界面选择“UEFI：”开头的U盘名称。
同理，如果电脑硬盘格式为MBR，那么在BIOS界面选择不带“UEFI：”开头的U盘启动。</p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>安装系统时建议使用本地账号登陆，账号名设为全英文。进入系统后再去设置里登录自己的微软账号</li>
</ul>
