<h2 id="23-工具类" class="heading-element"><span>3 2.3 工具类</span>
 <a href="#23-%e5%b7%a5%e5%85%b7%e7%b1%bb" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>软件商店：<a href="https://lestore.lenovo.com/about"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">联想应用商店<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
<li>解压缩：NanaZip（<a href="https://apps.microsoft.com/store/detail/9N8G7TSCL18R?hl=zh-cn&amp;gl=CN&amp;rtc=1"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">微软商店<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>）</li>
<li>图片：<a href="https://www.123pan.com/s/HQeA-w21Sh#3519"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">2345看图王 果核版<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>，第一次使用，请使用绿化卸载.exe进行绿化</li>
<li>输入法：<a href="https://shurufa.sogou.com/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">搜狗输入法<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 云联想、细胞词库仍然是天花板级别，广告就交给火绒拦截吧</li>
<li>截图：<a href="https://www.microsoft.com/store/productId/9P1WXPKB68KX"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Snipaste<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
<li>浏览器：edge（关闭后台运行、硬件加速）登录微软账号同步扩展、密码，或<a href="https://www.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Firefox<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://browser.360.cn/eex/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">360极速浏览器X<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>不建议安装Chrome，除非会科学上网同步数据
浏览器扩展推荐：<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/ublock-origin/odfafepnkmbhccpbejgmiehpchacaeak"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">uBlock Origin 去广告<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/awesome-screenshot-%E6%88%AA%E5%9B%BE%E5%BD%95%E5%B1%8F/gpmljinohlbfgmeoaeceoajachkabijo"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Awesome Screenshot 截图录屏<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/infinity-%E6%96%B0%E6%A0%87%E7%AD%BE%E9%A1%B5-pro/hajlmbnnniemimmaehcefkamdadpjlfa"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Infinity 新标签页 (Pro)<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/%E6%B2%99%E6%8B%89%E6%9F%A5%E8%AF%8D%E8%81%9A%E5%90%88%E8%AF%8D%E5%85%B8%E5%88%92%E8%AF%8D%E7%BF%BB%E8%AF%91/idghocbbahafpfhjnfhpbfbmpegphmmp"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">沙拉查词<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>、<a href="https://microsoftedge.microsoft.com/addons/detail/easyscholar/bpepicgagmdchlkjjeeiekpoafehpagm"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">学术需求：easyScholar<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
</blockquote>
<ul>
<li>通讯：微信、QQ。不得不用，在联想应用商店里直接下载</li>
<li>桌面管理：<a href="https://guanjia.qq.com/product/zmzl/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">腾讯桌面管理<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>：去除快捷方式小箭头、替代everthing、关闭壁纸

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>腾讯桌面管理</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png" alt="腾讯桌面管理" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290029000.png?size=large 2x" data-title="腾讯桌面管理" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">腾讯桌面管理</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ul>
<h2 id="24-音视频可选安装" class="heading-element"><span>4 2.4 音视频（可选安装）</span>
 <a href="#24-%e9%9f%b3%e8%a7%86%e9%a2%91%e5%8f%af%e9%80%89%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ul>
<li>音乐
<ul>
<li><a href="https://lxmusic.toside.cn/download"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">洛雪音乐<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>，配合<a href="https://www.sixyin.com/download?post=8498"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">六音音源<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
<li><a href="https://listen1.github.io/listen1/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Listen 1<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>，全平台免费听歌</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>本地音乐播放器：<a href="https://github.com/zhongyang219/MusicPlayer2/releases"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">MusicPlayer2<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
<li>播放器：<a href="https://lestore.lenovo.com/detail/15654?origin=pcstore_copylink"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">potplayer<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></li>
</ul>
<blockquote>
<p>Potplayer无边框设置：
选项——基本——默认皮肤，勾选<code>视频下自动隐藏</code>、<code>全屏时防止遮盖</code>；进阶皮肤，方式设置为<code>使用 Direct3D 9</code>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Potplayer无边框设置</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png" alt="Potplayer无边框设置" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202301290159701.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Potplayer无边框设置" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Potplayer无边框设置</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</blockquote>
<h2 id="25-下载工具可选安装" class="heading-element"><span>5 2.5 下载工具（可选安装）</span>
 <a href="#25-%e4%b8%8b%e8%bd%bd%e5%b7%a5%e5%85%b7%e5%8f%af%e9%80%89%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>IDM+迅雷组合秒杀一切。下方都是特殊版本，没事别升级</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="https://www.423down.com/575.html"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">IDM<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>：有浏览器扩展，资源嗅探能力最强，下载速度也是最快。但没法下种子</li>
<li><a href="https://www.neatdownloadmanager.com/index.php/en/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">NDM<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>：IDM平替，免费，没汉化</li>
<li><a href="https://motrix.app/zh-CN/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Motrix<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>：颜值高，能下种子。但有时会没速度</li>
</ul>

item.title: 在 Word 中使用 Zotero 插入参考文献
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011654593.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>本文介绍了如何在 Word 中使用 Zotero 插入参考文献，并设定东北大学要求的参考文献引用列表格式。</p>
<h2 id="准备工作" class="heading-element"><span>1 准备工作</span>
 <a href="#%e5%87%86%e5%a4%87%e5%b7%a5%e4%bd%9c" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="参考文献引用格式" class="heading-element"><span>1.1 参考文献引用格式</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e6%96%87%e7%8c%ae%e5%bc%95%e7%94%a8%e6%a0%bc%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>安装 GB/T 7714-2015 参考文献引用格式。</p>
<h4 id="zotero-官方7714样式不推荐" class="heading-element"><span>1.1.1 Zotero 官方7714样式（不推荐）</span>
 <a href="#zotero-%e5%ae%98%e6%96%b97714%e6%a0%b7%e5%bc%8f%e4%b8%8d%e6%8e%a8%e8%8d%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><div class="alert alert-warning"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M6.457 1.047c.659-1.234 2.427-1.234 3.086.0l6.082 11.378A1.75 1.75.0 0114.082 15H1.918A1.75 1.75.0 01.375 12.425zm1.763.707a.25.25.0 00-.44.0L1.698 13.132a.25.25.0 00.22.368h12.164a.25.25.0 00.22-.368zm.53 3.996v2.5a.75.75.0 01-1.5.0v-2.5a.75.75.0 011.5.0zM9 11a1 1 0 11-2 0 1 1 0 012 0z"/></svg>警告</p><p>此官方格式存在一些问题，如不能区分中英文文献，导致引用英文文献也是“等”，而不是“et al”。因此并不推荐。</p>
</div><ol>
<li>打开 Zotero，点击<code>编辑</code>-&gt;<code>首选项</code>-&gt;<code>引用</code></li>
<li>在<code>样式</code>中点击<code>获取更多样式</code></li>
<li>搜索<code>7714</code>即可安装国标引用样式。注意有1987、2005和2015三个时间，note、author-date 和 numeric 三个格式，鼠标悬停即可预览样式

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>安装Zotero 官方7714样式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png" alt="安装Zotero 官方7714样式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542774.png?size=large 2x" data-title="安装Zotero 官方7714样式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">安装Zotero 官方7714样式</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<h4 id="比较贴近-neu-要求的7714样式" class="heading-element"><span>1.1.2 比较贴近 NEU 要求的7714样式</span>
 <a href="#%e6%af%94%e8%be%83%e8%b4%b4%e8%bf%91-neu-%e8%a6%81%e6%b1%82%e7%9a%847714%e6%a0%b7%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>Github 上的<a href="https://github.com/redleafnew/Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl" title="Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>仓库（或<a href="https://gitee.com/redleafnew00/Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl" title="Gitee"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Gitee 镜像仓库<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>）提供7714 2015的官方样式及众多修改版，其中<a href="https://github.com/redleafnew/Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl/blob/main/002gb-t-7714-2015-numeric-bilingual-no-uppercase-no-url-doi.csl" title="002gb"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">002gb<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>样式比较符合东北大学的要求，除了网络文献的引用顺序有点差异。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>002gb样式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png" alt="002gb样式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542161.png?size=large 2x" data-title="002gb样式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">002gb样式</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<ol>
<li>点击 [<a href="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/redleafnew/Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl/main/002gb-t-7714-2015-numeric-bilingual-no-uppercase-no-url-doi.csl"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Github<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> | <a href="https://gitee.com/redleafnew00/Chinese-STD-GB-T-7714-related-csl/raw/main/002gb-t-7714-2015-numeric-bilingual-no-uppercase-no-url-doi.csl"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Gitee<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> ]下载引用格式文件</li>
<li>打开 Zotero，依次进入<code>编辑</code>-&gt;<code>首选项</code>-&gt;<code>引用</code></li>
<li>点击<code>+</code>号添加样式。选中已下载的002 csl 样式，打开。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>导入样式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png" alt="导入样式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/md_img202311071542053.png?size=large 2x" data-title="导入样式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">导入样式</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<blockquote>
<p>会提示<code>***.csl不是一个有效的 CSL 1.0.2 样式文件，你可能不能和Zotero一起正常工作</code>，不用管，点击 OK 继续导入。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>不管提示，继续导入</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png" alt="不管提示，继续导入" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011457740.png?size=large 2x" data-title="不管提示，继续导入" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">不管提示，继续导入</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</blockquote>
<ol start="4">
<li>点击 OK 保存退出首选项。然后重新打开<code>编辑</code>-&gt;<code>首选项</code>-&gt;<code>导出</code>—&gt;<strong>条目格式</strong>，设置成刚才导入的7714样式

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>设置默认导出样式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png" alt="设置默认导出样式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011502945.png?size=large 2x" data-title="设置默认导出样式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">设置默认导出样式</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<h3 id="在-word-中安装-zotero-插件" class="heading-element"><span>1.2 在 Word 中安装 Zotero 插件</span>
 <a href="#%e5%9c%a8-word-%e4%b8%ad%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-zotero-%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><ol>
<li>关闭所有已经打开的 Word</li>
<li>打开 Zotero，点击<code>编辑</code>-&gt;<code>首选项</code>-&gt;<code>引用</code></li>
<li>在<code>文档编辑软件</code>中点击<code>安装加载项 Microsoft Word</code>，记得勾选<code>使用经典版&quot;添加引注&quot;</code>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>安装加载项 Microsoft Word</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png" alt="安装加载项 Microsoft Word" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011508777.png?size=large 2x" data-title="安装加载项 Microsoft Word" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">安装加载项 Microsoft Word</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<h2 id="zotero-word-插件选项卡" class="heading-element"><span>2 Zotero Word 插件选项卡</span>
 <a href="#zotero-word-%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6%e9%80%89%e9%a1%b9%e5%8d%a1" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Zotero Word 插件选项卡</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png" alt="Zotero Word 插件选项卡" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061347758.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Zotero Word 插件选项卡" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Zotero Word 插件选项卡</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>一般情况下，Zotero 安装时会安装 Zotero Word 插件，其会在 Microsoft Word 里添加一个 Zotero 选项卡。如果你的 Word 里没有 Zotero 选项卡，请参见 <a href="https://zotero-chinese.com/user-guide/faqs/word-addon.html#%E6%B3%A8%E6%84%8F%E4%BA%8B%E9%A1%B9%E5%8F%8A%E4%B8%8E%E6%A0%B7%E5%BC%8F%E7%9B%B8%E5%85%B3%E7%9A%84%E5%B8%B8%E8%A7%81%E9%97%AE%E9%A2%98"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">故障排除 | 安装 Zotero 的 Word 插件<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 。</p>
<p>Zotero 选项卡包含以下图标：</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th>名称</th>
 <th>图标</th>
 <th>描述</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td>添加/编辑引注</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>插入引文</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png" alt="插入引文" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011515777.png?size=large 2x" data-title="插入引文" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">插入引文</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>在光标位置添加新引注或编辑文档中的现有引注。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td>添加/编辑参考文献表</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>添加参考文献表</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png" alt="添加参考文献表" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011517521.png?size=large 2x" data-title="添加参考文献表" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">添加参考文献表</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>在光标位置插入参考文献表或编辑现有书目。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td>添加笔记</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>添加笔记</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png" alt="添加笔记" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518001.png?size=large 2x" data-title="添加笔记" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">添加笔记</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>在光标当前位置插入笔记。请注意，此功能不常用，点击后会出现黄色插入框。如果不小心点开了，可以用键盘上的 <code>Esc</code> 键关闭黄色插入框。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td>文档首选项</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>文档首选项</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png" alt="文档首选项" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518149.png?size=large 2x" data-title="文档首选项" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">文档首选项</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>打开“文档首选项”窗口，例如更改引文样式。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td>刷新</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>刷新</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png" alt="刷新" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011518120.png?size=large 2x" data-title="刷新" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">刷新</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>立即刷新所有引注和参考文献表，更新 Zotero 库中已更改的项目元数据。</td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td>取消链接引注</td>
 <td>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>unlink</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png" alt="unlink" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011519095.png?size=large 2x" data-title="unlink" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">unlink</figcaption>
 </figure></td>
 <td>通过删除域代码来取消文档中 Zotero 引文的链接。这可以防止引文和书目的任何进一步自动更新。请注意，删除域代码是不可逆的，通常只能在文档的最终副本中完成。</td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<p>其中，<strong>文档首选项</strong>窗口允许您设置以下针对该文档的设置：</p>
<ol>
<li><strong>引文样式</strong>：一般情况下，你只需要修改这一项，其余设置均保持默认即可。</li>
<li>设置引注和参考文献表的格式的语言。</li>
<li>对于基于注释的样式，例如“China National Standard GB/T 7714-2015（note，Chinese）”，引文是插入为脚注还或尾注。脚注和尾注的样式和格式由 Word（而不是 Zotero）控制。</li>
<li>将引文存储为字段还是书签。默认为“字段”。除非您需要使用 LibreOffice 与同事协作，否则应始终选择“字段”。</li>
<li>对于缩写期刊标题的样式（例如，“Nature”），是否使用 MEDLINE 缩写列表来缩写标题。如果选择此选项（默认值），则 Zotero 中“ ”字段的内容将被忽略。</li>
<li><strong>是否自动更新引注和参考文献表</strong>：一般情况下开启即可。当文档中引文非常多，每次更新都会卡顿时，可以关闭此功能，添加一部分或最终手动进行更新。</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="插入参考文献" class="heading-element"><span>3 插入参考文献</span>

 </a>
</h2><div class="alert alert-important"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 1.75C0 .784.784.0 1.75.0h12.5C15.216.0 16 .784 16 1.75v9.5A1.75 1.75.0 0114.25 13H8.06l-2.573 2.573A1.458 1.458.0 013 14.543V13H1.75A1.75 1.75.0 010 11.25zm1.75-.25a.25.25.0 00-.25.25v9.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h2a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.19l2.72-2.72a.749.749.0 01.53-.22h6.5a.25.25.0 00.25-.25v-9.5a.25.25.0 00-.25-.25zm7 2.25v2.5a.75.75.0 01-1.5.0v-2.5a.75.75.0 011.5.0zM9 9A1 1 0 117 9a1 1 0 012 0z"/></svg>重要</p><p>注意：插入参考文献时要保证Zotero在后台运行。</p>
</div><h3 id="设置默认引用格式" class="heading-element"><span>3.1 设置默认引用格式</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e9%bb%98%e8%ae%a4%e5%bc%95%e7%94%a8%e6%a0%bc%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>打开要插入参考文献的 Word，点击 <code>Zotero 选项卡</code>-&gt;<code>Document Reference</code>，设置参考文献默认引用格式为 GB/T 7714-2015

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>设置参考文献默认引用格式为GB/T 7714-2015</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png" alt="设置参考文献默认引用格式为GB/T 7714-2015" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011523027.png?size=large 2x" data-title="设置参考文献默认引用格式为GB/T 7714-2015" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">设置参考文献默认引用格式为GB/T 7714-2015</figcaption>
 </figure></p>

</h3><p>只需要在插入参考文献时，选择<code>多重来源</code>，逐个添加参考文献到右边侧栏，然后点击<code>OK</code>即可。

 <a href="#%e5%88%a0%e9%99%a4%e6%88%96%e6%9b%b4%e6%8d%a2%e5%a4%9a%e9%87%8d%e6%9d%a5%e6%ba%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>选中 Word 中多重引用的位置，在<code>Zotero 选项卡</code>中点击<code>Add/Edit Citation</code>。
左箭头：删除其中一个文献；右箭头：添加一个文献。
上、下箭头：对引文重新排序。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>删除或更换多重来源</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif" alt="删除或更换多重来源" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011544296.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="删除或更换多重来源" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">删除或更换多重来源</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="设置参考文献格式" class="heading-element"><span>4 设置参考文献格式</span>
 <a href="#%e8%ae%be%e7%bd%ae%e5%8f%82%e8%80%83%e6%96%87%e7%8c%ae%e6%a0%bc%e5%bc%8f" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>Zotero 插入的参考文献引用列表，默认使用了 Word 中的<strong>书目</strong>样式。因此，只需要修改<strong>书目</strong>样式为学校要求的参考文献格式，就能保证刷新后不改变，且格式与学校要求保持一致。
NEU <strong>硕士</strong>毕业论文参考文献的格式要求如下：

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>NEU硕士毕业论文参考文献格式要求</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png" alt="NEU硕士毕业论文参考文献格式要求" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061323866.png?size=large 2x" data-title="NEU硕士毕业论文参考文献格式要求" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">NEU硕士毕业论文参考文献格式要求</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>将<strong>书目</strong>样式修改为如上格式后，再次插入或刷新参考文献，格式就会保持此样式不变。
也可以从 <a href="https://github.com/leegical/Blog_img/releases/tag/NEU-citation"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">NEU Zotero 参考文献格式 Word分享<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>中下载已经改好样式的 Word 文件。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>NEU-zotero-citation</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png" alt="NEU-zotero-citation" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404011625496.png?size=large 2x" data-title="NEU-zotero-citation" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">NEU-zotero-citation</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h2 id="注意事项" class="heading-element"><span>5 注意事项</span>
 <a href="#%e6%b3%a8%e6%84%8f%e4%ba%8b%e9%a1%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="等与-et-al" class="heading-element"><span>5.1 等与 et al</span>
 <a href="#%e7%ad%89%e4%b8%8e-et-al" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>如果英文文献作者超过3个，但显示为中文的<code>等</code>，而不是英文 <code>et al</code>。这是没有设置文献语言的原因。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>英文但显示等</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png" alt="英文但显示等" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061329315.png?size=large 2x" data-title="英文但显示等" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">英文但显示等</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>需要手动将英文文献信息中的 <code>语言</code> 字段修改为 <code>en</code>。同理，将中文文献的 <code>语言</code> 字段修改为 <code>zh-CN</code>。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>修改文献语言</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png" alt="修改文献语言" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012026213.png?size=large 2x" data-title="修改文献语言" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">修改文献语言</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>你也可以使用<a href="https://www.haoyep.com/posts/zotero-config/#%E5%8A%9F%E8%83%BD-1"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">茉莉花插件<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>实现自动识别语言。只需要全选文献——右键——小工具——<strong>Auto:智能识别语言</strong>，就可以自动更新文献语言。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Auto:智能识别语言</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png" alt="Auto:智能识别语言" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404061333176.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Auto:智能识别语言" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Auto:智能识别语言</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="文献名大小写" class="heading-element"><span>5.2 文献名大小写</span>
 <a href="#%e6%96%87%e7%8c%ae%e5%90%8d%e5%a4%a7%e5%b0%8f%e5%86%99" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>有些期刊或出版社（如 ACS）导出的文章题目（Title）是每个实词的首字母是大写，如：</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Measurement-Based Probabilistic Timing Analysis for Multi-path Programs</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>但一些杂志或学校要求是句子（Sentence）格式，即只是题目的首字母大写（缩写除外，都是大写），如：</p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Measurement-based probabilistic timing analysis for multi-path programs</strong></li>
</ul>
<p>修改方法有两种。</p>
<h4 id="单一文献手动修改" class="heading-element"><span>5.2.1 单一文献手动修改</span>
 <a href="#%e5%8d%95%e4%b8%80%e6%96%87%e7%8c%ae%e6%89%8b%e5%8a%a8%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>选中文章，然后在右侧文章信息 <code>信息/Info</code> 中 <code>标题/Title</code> 字段处右击，选择 <code>句首大写/Transform Text-Sentence case</code>，然后再把缩略语等需要大写的手动修改一下。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>手动句首大写</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif" alt="手动句首大写" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012054249.gif?size=large 2x" data-title="手动句首大写" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">手动句首大写</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h4 id="批量修改" class="heading-element"><span>5.2.2 批量修改</span>
 <a href="#%e6%89%b9%e9%87%8f%e4%bf%ae%e6%94%b9" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>批量转为句首字母大写，即 Sentence 模式的实现方法参考如下链接：
<a href="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/283889592" title="Zotero批量文章题目大小写转为首字母大写的方法（含视频）"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer" class="card-link"><span class="cl-backdrop" style="--cl-bg-url: url(/images/fixit.min.svg);"></span>

 <span class="cl-text">

<p>操作有风险，建议先备份库再进行下面的操作。</p>
<ol>
<li>选中需要转换的文献，本例中为4条全选。</li>
<li>在Zotero中依次点击：Zotero&gt;Tools&gt;Developer&gt;Run Javascript

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>运行js</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png" alt="运行js" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012100166.png?size=large 2x" data-title="运行js" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">运行js</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>
<p>3.在弹出的对话框中将以下代码复制进去：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span><span class="lnt">11
</span><span class="lnt">12
</span><span class="lnt">13
</span><span class="lnt">14
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-js" data-lang="js"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">zoteroPane</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">Zotero</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getActiveZoteroPane</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nx">items</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">zoteroPane</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getSelectedItems</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">result</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">for</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">item</span> <span class="k">of</span> <span class="nx">items</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">item</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">getField</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;title&#39;</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="s2">&#34; &#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">title</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&#34;\n&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kd">var</span> <span class="nx">new_title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">title</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sr">/\b([A-Z][a-z0-9]+|A)\b/g</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">x</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">toLowerCase</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">new_title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="nx">new_title</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sr">/(^|\?\s*)[a-z]/</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="kd">function</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="nx">x</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="p">{</span> <span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">x</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">toUpperCase</span><span class="p">();</span> <span class="p">});</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="nx">result</span> <span class="o">+=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;-&gt; &#34;</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="nx">new_title</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="s2">&#34;\n\n&#34;</span><span class="p">;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="c1">// Do it at your own risk
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"></span> <span class="nx">item</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">setField</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">&#39;title&#39;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="nx">new_title</span><span class="p">);</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="kr">await</span> <span class="nx">item</span><span class="p">.</span><span class="nx">saveTx</span><span class="p">();</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="p">}</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="k">return</span> <span class="nx">result</span><span class="p">;</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ol start="4">
<li>
<p>点击Run，右侧会显示题目的修改情况。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>Run js</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png" alt="Run js" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101922.png?size=large 2x" data-title="Run js" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">Run js</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
<li>
<p>关闭此窗口，则在Zotero主窗口发现已经修改完成，都成为句首字母大写，最好再核实一下，如果有不正确的，手动再修改一下。

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>句首字母大写效果</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png" alt="句首字母大写效果" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404012101563.png?size=large 2x" data-title="句首字母大写效果" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">句首字母大写效果</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="交叉引用" class="heading-element"><span>5.3 交叉引用</span>
 <a href="#%e4%ba%a4%e5%8f%89%e5%bc%95%e7%94%a8" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>Zotero 在 Word 中参考文献的上标并不是超链接/交叉引用格式，因此无法点击上标跳转到具体参考文献列表条目。可以通过 Word 中的宏实现交叉引用。</p>
<blockquote>
<p>参考教程：<a href="https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/674910734"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">Zotero 和 Word 参考文献与文末引用条目的超链接设置<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></p>
</blockquote>
<ol>
<li>打开Word -&gt; 视图 -&gt; 宏，选择<strong>查看宏</strong>

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>查看宏</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png" alt="查看宏" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232108298.png?size=large 2x" data-title="查看宏" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">查看宏</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
<li>输入宏名：<code>ZoteroLinkCitation</code>，点击<strong>创建</strong>宏

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>创建宏ZoteroLinkCitation</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png" alt="创建宏ZoteroLinkCitation" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232111552.png?size=large 2x" data-title="创建宏ZoteroLinkCitation" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">创建宏ZoteroLinkCitation</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
<li>将代码全部替换为：</li>
</ol>

<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-gdscript3" data-lang="gdscript3"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">Public</span> <span class="n">Sub</span> <span class="n">ZoteroLinkCitation</span><span class="p">()</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39; get selected area (if applicable)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">nStart</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nEnd</span><span class="o">&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">nStart</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Start</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">nEnd</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">End</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39; toggle screen updating</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Application</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ScreenUpdating</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39; define variables</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">titleAnchor</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">style</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">fieldCode</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">numOrYear</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">pos</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span><span class="o">&amp;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n3</span><span class="o">&amp;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ActiveWindow</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">View</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShowFieldCodes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ClearFormatting</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s1">&#39; find the Zotero bibliography</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;^d ADDIN ZOTERO_BIBL&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Replacement</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Forward</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wrap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdFindContinue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Format</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchCase</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWholeWord</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWildcards</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchSoundsLike</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchAllWordForms</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Execute</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; add bookmark for the Zotero bibliography</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">ActiveDocument</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bookmarks</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Add</span> <span class="ne">Range</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Range</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;Zotero_Bibliography&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DefaultSorting</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdSortByName</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShowHidden</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; loop through each field in the document</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">For</span> <span class="n">Each</span> <span class="n">aField</span> <span class="n">In</span> <span class="n">ActiveDocument</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Fields</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; check if the field is a Zotero in-text reference</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;##################################################</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">If</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">aField</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Code</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;ADDIN ZOTERO_ITEM&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="n">Then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fieldCode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">aField</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Code</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;#############</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; Prepare</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; Plain citation== Format of Textfield shown</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; must be in Brackets</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">plain_Cit</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">plCitStrBeg</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;plainCitation&#34;&#34;:&#34;&#34;[&#34;
</span></span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="s2"> plCitStrEnd = &#34;]&#34;&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">plCitStrBeg</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plCitStrBeg</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">plCitStrEnd</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">n1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">plain_Cit</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Reference &#39;</span><span class="n">as</span> <span class="n">shown</span><span class="s1">&#39; in word as a string</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Title array in fieldCode (all referenced Titles within this field)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">32</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Do</span> <span class="n">While</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;title&#34;&#34;:&#34;&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;title&#34;&#34;:&#34;&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;title&#34;&#34;:&#34;&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;&#34;,&#34;&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">n1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">If</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">&lt;</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="n">Then</span> <span class="s1">&#39;Exception the type &#39;</span><span class="n">Article</span><span class="s1">&#39;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="s2">&#34;}&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">If</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">fieldCode</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">fieldCode</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Loop</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Titles_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Number array with References shown in PlainCit</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Numer is equal or less than Titels, depending on the type</span>
