</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;[3], [8]-[10]; [2]-[4]; [2], [4], [5]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; All citations have to be in Brackets each! [3], [8] not [3, 8]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; This doesnt work otherwise!</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; --&gt; treatment of other delimiters could be implemented here</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">RefNumber</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">32</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Do</span> <span class="n">While</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;]&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="n">Or</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;[&#34;</span><span class="p">))</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="mi">0</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;[&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">InStr</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34;]&#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">RefNumber</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">i</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n1</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">plain_Cit</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">plain_Cit</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">n2</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Loop</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;treat only the shown references (skip the rest)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;[3], [8]-[10] --&gt; skip [9]</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Order of titles given from fieldcode, not checked!</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">If</span> <span class="n">Titles_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">&gt;</span> <span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="n">Then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Titles_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Do</span> <span class="n">While</span> <span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">&lt;=</span> <span class="n">Titles_in_Cit</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">+</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Loop</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">If</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;#############</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;Make the links</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">For</span> <span class="n">Refs</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span> <span class="n">To</span> <span class="n">Refs_in_Cit</span> <span class="o">-</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="n">Step</span> <span class="mi">1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">title</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Refs</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">array_RefTitle</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Refs</span><span class="p">)</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; make title a valid bookmark name</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">titleAnchor</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">title</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">titleAnchor</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">MakeValidBMName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">titleAnchor</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ActiveWindow</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">View</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShowFieldCodes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">GoTo</span> <span class="n">What</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">wdGoToBookmark</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;Zotero_Bibliography&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;&#39;</span> <span class="n">locate</span> <span class="n">the</span> <span class="n">corresponding</span> <span class="n">reference</span> <span class="ow">in</span> <span class="n">the</span> <span class="n">bibliography</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;&#39;</span> <span class="n">by</span> <span class="n">searching</span> <span class="k">for</span> <span class="n">its</span> <span class="n">title</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ClearFormatting</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">title</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">255</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Replacement</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Forward</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wrap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdFindContinue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Format</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchCase</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWholeWord</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWildcards</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchSoundsLike</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchAllWordForms</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Execute</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; select the whole caption (for mouseover tooltip)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MoveStartUntil</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">&#34;[&#34;</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="n">Count</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">wdBackward</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MoveEndUntil</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="n">vbBack</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">lnkcap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;[&#34;</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">lnkcap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">lnkcap</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">70</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; add bookmark for the reference within the bibliography</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Shrink</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">ActiveDocument</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Bookmarks</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Add</span> <span class="ne">Range</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Range</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">name</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">titleAnchor</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">DefaultSorting</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdSortByName</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShowHidden</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; jump back to the field</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">aField</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Select</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; find and select the numeric part of the field which will become the hyperlink</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ClearFormatting</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">RefNumber</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Refs</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Replacement</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Forward</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">True</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Wrap</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdFindContinue</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Format</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchCase</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWholeWord</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchWildcards</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchSoundsLike</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">MatchAllWordForms</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Find</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Execute</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">numOrYear</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Range</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Text</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; store current style这一行如果不注释可能会存在格式变化</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; style = Selection.style</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; Generate the Hyperlink --&gt;Forward!</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ActiveDocument</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Hyperlinks</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Add</span> <span class="n">anchor</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Range</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">Address</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">SubAddress</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">titleAnchor</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ScreenTip</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">lnkcap</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">TextToDisplay</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;&#34;</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">numOrYear</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; reset the style这一行如果不注释可能会存在格式变化</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; Selection.style = style</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; comment if you want standard link style</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">aField</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Select</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">With</span> <span class="n">Selection</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Font</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Underline</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdUnderlineNone</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">wdColorBlack</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">With</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Next</span> <span class="n">Refs</span> <span class="s1">&#39;References in Cit</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">If</span> <span class="s1">&#39;If Zotero-Field</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39;#########################</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Next</span> <span class="n">aField</span> <span class="s1">&#39; next field</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="s1">&#39; go back to original range selected</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ActiveWindow</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">View</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ShowFieldCodes</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">False</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">ActiveDocument</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Range</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">nStart</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">nEnd</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Select</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> 
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">Sub</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Function</span> <span class="n">MakeValidBMName</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">pFirstChr</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="n">Long</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Dim</span> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="n">As</span> <span class="ne">String</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">strIn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Trim</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">pFirstChr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">If</span> <span class="n">Not</span> <span class="n">pFirstChr</span> <span class="n">Like</span> <span class="s2">&#34;[A-Za-z]&#34;</span> <span class="n">Then</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">strIn</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">&#34;A_&#34;</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">strIn</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">If</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">For</span> <span class="n">i</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">1</span> <span class="n">To</span> <span class="n">Len</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Select</span> <span class="n">Case</span> <span class="n">Asc</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">Mid</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">))</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Case</span> <span class="mi">49</span> <span class="n">To</span> <span class="mi">57</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">65</span> <span class="n">To</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">97</span> <span class="n">To</span> <span class="mi">122</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="n">Mid</span><span class="o">$</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">strIn</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">i</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">1</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Case</span> <span class="n">Else</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="o">&amp;</span> <span class="s2">&#34;_&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">Select</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">Next</span> <span class="n">i</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">tempStr</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tempStr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34; &#34;</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s2">&#34; &#34;</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">MakeValidBMName</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">Left</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">tempStr</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">40</span><span class="p">)</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"> <span class="n">End</span> <span class="n">Function</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><ol start="4">
<li>Ctrl+s 保存，左下角重命名为 ZoteroLinkCitation，关闭页面，并关闭 Word

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>重命名宏</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png" alt="重命名宏" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232116706.png?size=large 2x" data-title="重命名宏" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">重命名宏</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
<li>重新打开 Word -&gt; 视图 -&gt; 宏，选择<code>ZoteroLinkCitation</code>，点击运行即可

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>运行宏ZoteroLinkCitation</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png" alt="运行宏ZoteroLinkCitation" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202404232119280.png?size=large 2x" data-title="运行宏ZoteroLinkCitation" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">运行宏ZoteroLinkCitation</figcaption>
 </figure></li>
</ol>

item.title: Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64位系统安装 clang10 版本
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171430419.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>本文记录了Ubuntu 22.04 LTS 64位系统安装 clang10 版本的过程。</p>
<h2 id="安装-clang10" class="heading-element"><span>1 安装 clang10</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-clang10" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><ol>
<li>编辑 apt 源文件。</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo nano /etc/apt/sources.list</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>添加以下内容：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt"> 1
</span><span class="lnt"> 2
</span><span class="lnt"> 3
</span><span class="lnt"> 4
</span><span class="lnt"> 5
</span><span class="lnt"> 6
</span><span class="lnt"> 7
</span><span class="lnt"> 8
</span><span class="lnt"> 9
</span><span class="lnt">10
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-gdscript3" data-lang="gdscript3"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># clang 9/10</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># i386 not available</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span> <span class="n">main</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">src</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span> <span class="n">main</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 9</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">9</span> <span class="n">main</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">src</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">9</span> <span class="n">main</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 10</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span> <span class="n">main</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="n">deb</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">src</span> <span class="n">http</span><span class="p">:</span><span class="o">//</span><span class="n">apt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">org</span><span class="o">/</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">/</span> <span class="n">llvm</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">toolchain</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="n">focal</span><span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">10</span> <span class="n">main</span></span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>添加clang9/10源</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png" alt="添加clang9/10源" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171506785.png?size=large 2x" data-title="添加clang9/10源" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">添加clang9/10源</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<ol start="2">
<li>安装 clang10</li>
</ol>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 先添加key</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">wget -O - https://apt.llvm.org/llvm-snapshot.gpg.key <span class="p">|</span> sudo apt-key add -
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 更新源</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt update
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装 clang10</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt-get install clang-10 llvm-10-dev llvm-10-tools -y</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h2 id="切换默认命令版本" class="heading-element"><span>2 切换默认命令版本</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%87%e6%8d%a2%e9%bb%98%e8%ae%a4%e5%91%bd%e4%bb%a4%e7%89%88%e6%9c%ac" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p>安装完成后，默认的命令是<code>clang-10</code>和<code>clang++-10</code>，需要使用<code>update-alternatives</code>来设置成<code>clang</code>和<code>clang++</code>。</p>
<p>首先查看当前 clang 默认版本：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">clang --version</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>如图，当前版本是 clang14

<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>clang 默认版本输出</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png" alt="clang 默认版本输出" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507177.png?size=large 2x" data-title="clang 默认版本输出" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">clang 默认版本输出</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="切换成-clang10" class="heading-element"><span>2.1 切换成 clang10</span>
 <a href="#%e5%88%87%e6%8d%a2%e6%88%90-clang10" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang clang /usr/bin/clang-10 <span class="m">1</span> --slave /usr/bin/clang++ clang++ /usr/bin/clang++-10</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>切换成 clang10</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png" alt="切换成 clang10" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171507032.png?size=large 2x" data-title="切换成 clang10" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">切换成 clang10</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="恢复原有的-clang-版本" class="heading-element"><span>2.2 恢复原有的 clang 版本</span>
 <a href="#%e6%81%a2%e5%a4%8d%e5%8e%9f%e6%9c%89%e7%9a%84-clang-%e7%89%88%e6%9c%ac" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>这里也给出切换回 clang14的命令：</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/clang clang /usr/bin/clang-14 <span class="m">2</span> --slave /usr/bin/clang++ clang++ /usr/bin/clang++-14</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div>

item.title: zsh 安装与配置，使用 oh-my-zsh 美化终端
item.description:
<img src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401171434163.png" alt="featured image" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"><p>传统的 bash 功能比较简陋，且不美观。本文基于 Ubuntu22.04 LTS 系统，安装 zsh，并使用 oh-my-zsh 对终端进行美化。Oh My Zsh 是基于 zsh 命令行的一个扩展工具集，提供了丰富的扩展功能。</p>
<h2 id="环境配置" class="heading-element"><span>1 环境配置</span>
 <a href="#%e7%8e%af%e5%a2%83%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="安装基本工具" class="heading-element"><span>1.1 安装基本工具</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e5%9f%ba%e6%9c%ac%e5%b7%a5%e5%85%b7" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight" title="安装基本工具"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 更新软件源</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt update <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> sudo apt upgrade -y
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 安装 zsh git curl</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo apt install zsh git curl -y</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>设置默认终端为 zsh（<strong>注意：不要使用 sudo</strong>）。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">chsh -s /bin/zsh</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h3 id="安装-oh-my-zsh" class="heading-element"><span>1.2 安装 oh-my-zsh</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85-oh-my-zsh" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>官网：<a href="http://ohmyz.sh/"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">http://ohmyz.sh/<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>。
安装方式任选一个即可。</p>
<table>
 <thead>
 <tr>
 <th style="text-align: left">Method</th>
 <th style="text-align: left">Command</th>
 </tr>
 </thead>
 <tbody>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><strong>curl</strong></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><code>sh -c &quot;$(curl -fsSL https://install.ohmyz.sh/)&quot;</code></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><strong>wget</strong></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><code>sh -c &quot;$(wget -O- https://install.ohmyz.sh/)&quot;</code></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left"><strong>fetch</strong></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><code>sh -c &quot;$(fetch -o - https://install.ohmyz.sh/)&quot;</code></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">国内curl<a href="https://gitee.com/pocmon/ohmyzsh"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">镜像<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><code>sh -c &quot;$(curl -fsSL https://gitee.com/pocmon/ohmyzsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh)&quot;</code></td>
 </tr>
 <tr>
 <td style="text-align: left">国内wget<a href="https://gitee.com/pocmon/ohmyzsh"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">镜像<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a></td>
 <td style="text-align: left"><code>sh -c &quot;$(wget -O- https://gitee.com/pocmon/ohmyzsh/raw/master/tools/install.sh)&quot;</code></td>
 </tr>
 </tbody>
</table>
<p>注意：同意使用 Oh-my-zsh 的配置模板覆盖已有的 <code>.zshrc</code>。</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>安装 oh-my-zsh</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png" alt="安装 oh-my-zsh" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012224221.png?size=large 2x" data-title="安装 oh-my-zsh" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">安装 oh-my-zsh</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="从bashrc中迁移配置可选" class="heading-element"><span>1.3 从<code>.bashrc</code>中迁移配置（可选）</span>
 <a href="#%e4%bb%8ebashrc%e4%b8%ad%e8%bf%81%e7%a7%bb%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e5%8f%af%e9%80%89" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>如果之前在使用<code>bash</code>时自定义了一些环境变量、别名等，那么在切换到<code>zsh</code>后，你需要手动迁移这些自定义配置。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-shell" data-lang="shell"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 查看bash配置文件，并手动复制自定义配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">cat ~/.bashrc
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 编辑zsh配置文件，并粘贴自定义配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">nano ~/.zshrc
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 启动新的zsh配置</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">source</span> ~/.zshrc</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p><code>root</code>用户在执行<code>sudo su</code>命令后，再运行上述代码查看、手动复制、粘贴自定义配置。</p>
<h2 id="配置主题" class="heading-element"><span>2 配置主题</span>
 <a href="#%e9%85%8d%e7%bd%ae%e4%b8%bb%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><h3 id="自定义主题" class="heading-element"><span>2.1 自定义主题</span>
 <a href="#%e8%87%aa%e5%ae%9a%e4%b9%89%e4%b8%bb%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">sudo wget -O <span class="nv">$ZSH_CUSTOM</span>/themes/haoomz.zsh-theme https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/zsh/haoomz.zsh-theme</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>编辑 <code>~/.zshrc</code> 文件，将 <code>ZSH_THEME</code> 设为 <code>haoomz</code>。当然你也可以设置为其他主题，例如<code>lukerandall</code>、<code>robbyrussell</code>。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">nano ~/.zshrc
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nv">ZSH_THEME</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s2">&#34;haoomz&#34;</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">source</span> ~/.zshrc</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>设置ZSH_THEME</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png" alt="设置ZSH_THEME" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012235958.png?size=large 2x" data-title="设置ZSH_THEME" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">设置ZSH_THEME</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>效果如下（<code>robbyrussell</code> → <code>haoomz</code>）：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>haoomz主题</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png" alt="haoomz主题" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012238625.png?size=large 2x" data-title="haoomz主题" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">haoomz主题</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h3 id="推荐主题" class="heading-element"><span>2.2 推荐主题</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8e%a8%e8%8d%90%e4%b8%bb%e9%a2%98" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><p>你可以在<a href="https://github.com/ohmyzsh/ohmyzsh/wiki/Themes"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">内置主题样式截图<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a>中查看所有 zsh 内置的主题样式和对应的主题名。这些内置主题已经放在 ～/.oh-my-zsh/themes 目录下，不需要再下载。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="nb">cd</span> ~/.oh-my-zsh/themes <span class="o">&amp;&amp;</span> ls</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>zsh 内置的主题样式</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png" alt="zsh 内置的主题样式" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012242407.png?size=large 2x" data-title="zsh 内置的主题样式" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">zsh 内置的主题样式</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h4 id="powerlevel10k" class="heading-element"><span>2.2.1 powerlevel10k</span>
 <a href="#powerlevel10k" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>根据 <a href="https://www.slant.co/topics/7553/~theme-for-oh-my-zsh"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">What&rsquo;s the best theme for Oh My Zsh?<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 中的排名，以及自定义化、美观程度，强烈建议使用 <a href="https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">powerlevel10k<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 主题。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --depth<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> https://github.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="nv">$HOME</span><span class="p">/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/themes/powerlevel10k
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 中国用户可以使用 gitee.com 上的官方镜像加速下载</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone --depth<span class="o">=</span><span class="m">1</span> https://gitee.com/romkatv/powerlevel10k.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="nv">$HOME</span><span class="p">/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/themes/powerlevel10k</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><p>在 <code>~/.zshrc</code> 设置 <code>ZSH_THEME=&quot;powerlevel10k/powerlevel10k&quot;</code>。接下来，终端会自动引导你配置 <code>powerlevel10k</code>。</p>
<h2 id="安装插件" class="heading-element"><span>3 安装插件</span>
 <a href="#%e5%ae%89%e8%a3%85%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h2><p><code>oh-my-zsh</code> 已经内置了 <code>git</code> 插件，内置插件可以在 <code>～/.oh-my-zsh/plugins</code> 中查看，下面介绍一下我常用的插件，更多插件可以在 <a href="https://github.com/unixorn/awesome-zsh-plugins"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">awesome-zsh-plugins<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 里查看。</p>
<h3 id="插件推荐" class="heading-element"><span>3.1 插件推荐</span>
 <a href="#%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6%e6%8e%a8%e8%8d%90" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h3><h4 id="zsh--autosuggestions" class="heading-element"><span>3.1.1 zsh -autosuggestions</span>
 <a href="#zsh--autosuggestions" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><a href="https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">zsh-autosuggestions<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 是一个命令提示插件，当你输入命令时，会自动推测你可能需要输入的命令，按下右键可以快速采用建议。效果如下：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>zsh-autosuggestions自动补全</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png" alt="zsh-autosuggestions自动补全" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012250028.png?size=large 2x" data-title="zsh-autosuggestions自动补全" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">zsh-autosuggestions自动补全</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>安装方式：把插件下载到本地的 <code>~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins</code> 目录。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 中国用户可以使用下面任意一个加速下载</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.moeyy.xyz/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://gh.xmly.dev/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://gh.api.99988866.xyz/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-autosuggestions</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="zsh-syntax-highlighting" class="heading-element"><span>3.1.2 zsh-syntax-highlighting</span>
 <a href="#zsh-syntax-highlighting" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><a href="https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting"target="_blank" rel="external nofollow noopener noreferrer">zsh-syntax-highlighting<i class="fa-solid fa-external-link-alt fa-fw fa-xs ms-1 text-secondary" aria-hidden="true"></i></a> 是一个命令语法校验插件，在输入命令的过程中，若指令不合法，则指令显示为红色，若指令合法就会显示为绿色。效果如下：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>命令语法校验</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png" alt="命令语法校验" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012252786.png?size=large 2x" data-title="命令语法校验" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">命令语法校验</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<p>安装方式：把插件下载到本地的 <code>~/.oh-my-zsh/custom/plugins</code> 目录。</p>
<div class="highlight"><div class="chroma">
<table class="lntable"><tr><td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code><span class="lnt">1
</span><span class="lnt">2
</span><span class="lnt">3
</span><span class="lnt">4
</span><span class="lnt">5
</span><span class="lnt">6
</span><span class="lnt">7
</span><span class="lnt">8
</span><span class="lnt">9
</span></code></pre></td>
<td class="lntd">
<pre tabindex="0" class="chroma"><code class="language-bash" data-lang="bash"><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 中国用户可以使用下面任意一个加速下载</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速1</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://github.moeyy.xyz/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速2</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://gh.xmly.dev/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl"><span class="c1"># 加速3</span>
</span></span><span class="line"><span class="cl">git clone https://gh.api.99988866.xyz/https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting.git <span class="si">${</span><span class="nv">ZSH_CUSTOM</span><span class="k">:-</span><span class="p">~/.oh-my-zsh/custom</span><span class="si">}</span>/plugins/zsh-syntax-highlighting</span></span></code></pre></td></tr></table>
</div>
</div><h4 id="z" class="heading-element"><span>3.1.3 z</span>
 <a href="#z" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><code>oh-my-zsh</code> 内置了 <code>z</code> 插件。<code>z</code> 是一个文件夹快捷跳转插件，对于曾经跳转过的目录，只需要输入最终目标文件夹名称，就可以快速跳转，避免再输入长串路径，提高切换文件夹的效率。效果如下：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>使用z跳转目录</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png" alt="使用z跳转目录" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012254065.png?size=large 2x" data-title="使用z跳转目录" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">使用z跳转目录</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h4 id="extract" class="heading-element"><span>3.1.4 extract</span>
 <a href="#extract" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p><code>oh-my-zsh</code> 内置了 <code>extract</code> 插件。<code>extract</code> 用于解压任何压缩文件，不必根据压缩文件的后缀名来记忆压缩软件。使用 <code>x</code> 命令即可解压文件，效果如下：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>extract 解压</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png" alt="extract 解压" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012259966.png?size=large 2x" data-title="extract 解压" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">extract 解压</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<h4 id="web-search" class="heading-element"><span>3.1.5 web-search</span>
 <a href="#web-search" class="heading-mark">
 <svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg>
 </a>
</h4><p>oh-my-zsh 内置了 <code>web-search</code> 插件。<code>web-search</code> 能让我们在命令行中使用搜索引擎进行搜索。使用<code>搜索引擎关键字+搜索内容</code> 即可自动打开浏览器进行搜索。效果如下：</p>
<p>
<figure><a class="lightgallery" href="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png?size=large" data-thumbnail="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png?size=small" data-sub-html="<h2> </h2><p>web-search搜索</p>"><img loading="lazy" src="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png" alt="web-search搜索" srcset="https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png?size=small, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png?size=medium 1.5x, https://cdn.haoyep.com/gh/leegical/Blog_img/cdnimg/202401012302476.png?size=large 2x" data-title="web-search搜索" style="background: url(/images/loading.min.svg) no-repeat center;" onload="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}this.dataset.lazyloaded='';" onerror="this.title=this.dataset.title;for(const i of ['style', 'data-title','onerror','onload']){this.removeAttribute(i);}"/></a><figcaption class="image-caption">web-search搜索</figcaption>
 </figure></p>
<div class="alert alert-important"><p class="alert-title"><svg class="icon" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 16 16" width="16" height="16"><path d="M0 1.75C0 .784.784.0 1.75.0h12.5C15.216.0 16 .784 16 1.75v9.5A1.75 1.75.0 0114.25 13H8.06l-2.573 2.573A1.458 1.458.0 013 14.543V13H1.75A1.75 1.75.0 010 11.25zm1.75-.25a.25.25.0 00-.25.25v9.5c0 .138.112.25.25.25h2a.75.75.0 01.75.75v2.19l2.72-2.72a.749.749.0 01.53-.22h6.5a.25.25.0 00.25-.25v-9.5a.25.25.0 00-.25-.25zm7 2.25v2.5a.75.75.0 01-1.5.0v-2.5a.75.75.0 011.5.0zM9 9A1 1 0 117 9a1 1 0 012 0z"/></svg>重要</p><p>最后，记得<a href="#%e5%90%af%e7%94%a8%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6">启用所有插件</a>。</p>
</div><h3 id="启用插件" class="heading-element"><span>3.2 启用插件</span>
 <a href="#%e5%90%af%e7%94%a8%e6%8f%92%e4%bb%b6" class="heading-mark">
